Alek Britva

WHY CHOOSE us

We are a premier electrical services company offering 24/7 support to residential, commercial and industrial clients throughout Greater Chicagoland. Since opening our doors nearly 15 years ago, we’ve never stopped striving to provide the innovative, timely and cost-effective solutions our clients have come to expect.

Call EMF Power any time — day or night — in case of emergency. We’ll send a courteous, expert electrician to your home or business at a moment’s notice. You may also fill out the free quote form above for your no-obligation estimate and consultation today!

alek britva

Alek Britva is the sole owner of EMF Power Co. in Northbrook and has been in business since April of 2000. He has built a solid reputation and strong industry affiliations within Electrical Contracting simply through a word-of-mouth business approach. He immigrated with his family to the United States from Minsk, Belarus in 1981, and grew up in Glenview. He graduated from Glenbrook South High School in 1994 and received his Electrician Certification in 1998 from Coyne American Institute in Chicago. He has experience as a General Contractor in rehabs, investment properties, and multi-unit property management. He currently holds certifications in Mold Remediation and Abatement of Lead-Based Paint. His professional interests include new advancements in Green Technology with a focus on Solar and Wind Renewable Energy, Generac Generator Systems, and Thermal Imaging surveys. He has over fifteen years of experience in the Electrical Services industry and has worked on projects for residential, commercial and industrial clientele.

1570 Asbury Ave, Winnetka, IL

Magnificent Nantucket style home~approx 8400 sq ft of finished space. Stone & shingle exterior with copper downspouts situated on a . 5 acre lot in a desirable location.

Sprawling floor plan, high ceilings, over sized moldings, custom millwork/woodwork, dramatic 2-story foyer with 20 ft. ceilings, a kitchen straight our of Architectural Digest, front and rear porches. 6 bedrooms, 6.2 baths, luxurious master suite with spa-like bath and 5 wood burning fireplaces with gas starters.

Expansive Lower Level includes media room, exercise room, refrigerated custom wine cellar/bar and 6th bedroom/bathroom. Incredible attention to detail.
